definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

pinyin: shou3 ci4 zhu4 shi4 shi2 jian1

sentences.english: They spend long hours staring at the screen with few breaks.
sentences.chinese: 他们长时间地注视屏幕，几乎不休息。

sentences.english: She stood with her back to him, staring at the back wall of his house.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那儿，背对着他，目光注视着房子的后墙。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韩军人在几公分外的窗口另一侧注视着他们。

sentences.english: The doctor watched the patient sympathetically.
sentences.chinese: 医生同情地注视着病人。
杜库等待着，注视着他的徒弟。

sentences.english: The pilots looked outside the cockpit window and saw that the plane was coated by a thin cloud.
sentences.chinese: 驾驶员注视座舱窗外，看到飞机被一层薄云覆盖。

sentences.english: They watched the rain pit the sea with tiny craters.
sentences.chinese: 他们注视着雨滴在海上面砸出的小水窝。

sentences.english: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

sentences.english: She gave him, straight in the eyes, a look which was also inscrutable.
sentences.chinese: 她还目光炯炯地注视了他一下，这也使他不能理解。

sentences.english: He was watching the red flames in the wide open fireplace .
sentences.chinese: 他注视着敞着的宽大壁炉里的熊熊火焰。

sentences.english: Put'em in a glass and watch them divide…lotza fun.
sentences.chinese: 分入玻杯，注视其变色的过程。

sentences.english: But it's wonderful to contemplate this cluster of stars on a winter night.
sentences.chinese: 但在冬夜，注视这个星团显得如此美妙。

sentences.english: On hospital bed, Her tearful eyes dance gazed at him, Therefore they are married.
sentences.chinese: 病床上，她泪眼婆娑的注视著他，于是，他们结婚了。

sentences.english: The same it is with looking at faces of humanoids with big black eyes.
sentences.chinese: 注视大大的类人黑色眼睛结局一样。

sentences.english: She watches intently from her keyhole behind the door of the forgotten room.
sentences.chinese: 她在忘却之室，从门的锁孔密切地注视。

sentences.english: What he attends to is a whole, not the minor part that occasionally secedes .
sentences.chinese: 他注视的是整体，对少数偶尔脱离的部分毫不在意。

definition: to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to run one's eyes over/to sweep one's eyes over
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
attention/to stare at/to fix attention on sth
to size sb up/to look sb up and down/to take the measure of/to suppose/to reckon
to watch attentively/to fix one's attention on/to stare at/to gaze at
to watch sb closely/to breathe down sb's neck/to mark (sports)
